rules.ruleString: Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ECC3810} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Must be enrolled in course type {03, 04, 05, 06, 09, 09-1}

description: Models of decision making in the collective setting, utilising a number of tools, some of which will be familiar microeconomic ones. Economic approaches to collective decision environments, including 'new welfare economics', the 'Chicago' and 'Virginia' schools. Whenever possible, Australian policies will be examined in light of theory.
